entry.title: SK3CHI3/universal-resource-hub: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. entry.title: Vijaysingh1621/AI-Code-Editor: Codecraft AI is a lightweight, AI-assisted code editor designed to boost developer productivity with intelligent code suggestions, auto-completion, and quick fixes.
